abilities.name: Dragon Lift
abilities.effect: Your Pokémon in play have no Retreat Cost, except Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Flame Jet GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
